question: Which company has recently launched a ThinkBook laptop for small and medium-sized businesses in India?
explanation: Lenovo launched ThinkBook -- a new sub-brand dedicated to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in India.The company has made two additions to the ThinkBook sub-brand with the ThinkBook 14 and ThinkBook 15 which will be available in the first week of December at a starting price of Rs 30,990. ThinkBook is specially designed for the SMBs, thus, providing a unique balance of premium metal design to appeal to the new workforce with business grade security and services.
